item.scguns_oregunized.assassin_dagger_t: An easily concealed, sharply honed dagger often used for the assassinations by members of the Order
raid.scguns.stellar_order.name: Summons the Stellar Order
raid.announcement.scguns_oregunized.stel: The Strike Force of the Order is here!
scguns.desc.hermes: WIP Powerful handcannon helped the Order to deal with paranormal activities inside the secret laboratories of the Federacy
scguns.desc.avantrima: WIP Quick burst of 4 rounds guaranteed success in every covert operation and made it a reliable standard issue of Arphilem strike force. Was often equipped with a silencer
scguns.desc.haretrot: WIP Extra quiet, extra deadly. Strike Force of the Stellar Order ordered idk  Air-powered lead bolt launcher
scguns.desc.volter_sp: WIP The first experiment of the Order with shockarms developed by the Volter. This easily concealable electric scatterpistol was popular amongst
scguns.desc.mactricia: WIP Standard issue rifle of the Volter's Sector strike force,
scguns.desc.jupiter-7: Directed Redstone Flux energy conducted through an amethyst shard
